[Unit]
Description=keepalived in a Container
After=haproxy.service
Requires=haproxy.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm -f keepalived-mgmt
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull arcts/keepalived:latest
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run 					\
	--net=host									\
	--cap-add NET_ADMIN 						\
	-e KEEPALIVED_AUTOCONF=true					\
	-e KEEPALIVED_STATE=MASTER					\
	-e KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_VIRTUAL_ROUTER_ID=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_ID}			\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_SRC_IP=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_SRC}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_PEER_0=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_PEER_0}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_PEER_1=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_PEER_1}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_TRACK_INTERFACE_1=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_VIRTUAL_IPADDRESS_1="${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_VIP}/24 dev ${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}" \
	-e KEEPALIVED_KUBE_APISERVER_CHECK=true		\
	-e KUBE_APISERVER_ADDRESS=${MGMT_KEEPALIVED_SRC}	\
	-e KUBE_APISERVER_CHK_FALL=2				\
	-e KUBE_APISERVER_CHK_INTERVAL=2			\
	--name keepalived-mgmt						\
	arcts/keepalived:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop keepalived-mgmt

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: keepalived-mgmt.service

[Unit]
Description=Haproxy in a Container
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm -f haproxy
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull walser/haproxy:latest
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
    -p 8081:8080 \
    -p 6444:6443 \
    -e LB_HOST=${HOSTNAME} \
    --name haproxy \
    walser/haproxy:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop haproxy

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: haproxy.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=GlusterFS in a Container
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm -f gluster
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull gluster/gluster-centos:latest
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
    -v /etc/glusterfs:/etc/glusterfs:z \
    -v /var/lib/glusterd:/var/lib/glusterd:z \
    -v /var/log/glusterfs:/var/log/glusterfs:z \
    -v /sys/fs/cgroup:/sys/fs/cgroup:ro \
    -v /dev/:/dev \
    -v /gluster:/gluster \
    --privileged=true \
    --net=host \
    --name gluster \
    gluster/gluster-centos:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop gluster

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: gluster.service

[Unit]
Description=Bind9 in a Container
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm -f bind
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull walser/dnssec:latest
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
    -v /etc/domains/yaml:/domains \
    -v /etc/domains/keys:/var/bind/keys \
    -p 53:53/udp \
    -p 53:53/tcp \
    -e SALT=7d70b91db47137cd \
    --name bind \
    walser/dnssec:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker stop bind

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: bind.service
